mapper.insert: INSERT INTO claimQuestion (nickname, qtitle, qcontent, qdatetime, qcheck, qtype) VALUES(#{nickname}, #{qtitle}, #{qcontent}, now(), "준비중", #{qtype})
INSERT INTO claimAnswer (qno, acontent, adatetime) VALUES(#{qno}, #{acontent}, now())
mapper.select: SELECT COUNT(*) FROM claimQuestion AS q JOIN claimAnswer AS a ON q.qno = a.qno WHERE q.qno = #{qno}

choose.when: SELECT q.*, a.* FROM claimQuestion AS q JOIN claimAnswer AS a ON q.qno = a.qno WHERE q.qno = #{qno};
